entry.question: What is the longest word in English?

The proper word form of the number 444,444,444 is read as:
entry.answer: four hundred and forty-four million four hundred and forty-four thousand four hundred and forty-four.
four hundred and forty-four and four hundred and forty-four and four hundred and forty-four.
four hundred fourty four million four hundred fourty four thousand four hundred fourty four.
four hundred and forty four millionths four hundred and forty four thousandths four hundred and forty four.

entry.question: The proper word form of the number 123,456,789 is read as:
entry.answer: one hundred and twenty-three million four hundred and fifty-six thousand seven hundred and eighty-nine.
one hundred and twenty-three and four hundred and fifty-six and seven hundred and eighty-nine.
one hundred and twenty-three millionths four hundred and fifty-six thousandths seven hundred and eighty-nine.
one hundreds and twenty-three millions four hundreds and fifty-six thousands seven hundreds and eighty-nine.
